name: Bunny Tower
description:
Bunnies lead a dull existence without carrots. One day, carrots suddenly start falling from the sky! Curious about the falling carrots, the bunnies try to climb higher up.

Build a tower of bunnies all the way up into space to reach your destination - the kingdom of the infinite and divine carrot being!

Little bunnies are quick and difficult to catch. The bigger ones are heavier and if you're not careful they might topple your whole tower!
